meaningMnemonic: What <kanji>indicate</kanji>s that you've been <kanji>enlighten</kanji>ed enough to reach enlightenment? A <vocabulary>revelation</vocabulary>! That's the only way you can know you've been enlightened enough.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
